About

Welcome to my personal website blog!

I am currently a computer and information science student at the Ohio State University. I live in Columbus, OH. I am from Suzhou, China, and I come from Suzhou High School.

My favorite language is C++, while I am also familiar with Java, Python, Javascript.

Feel free to contact me at any time: Discord
